replies.replyComment:
When this incident happened, the UK proscribed LTTE Terrorists were shouting "Our nation Eelam - Our Leader Prabakaran." 

If you look at the AV, what better response to show that a sovereign nation represented by the Lion Flag has slit the throat of Terrorism." Kudos! Counsellor (Defence) Brigadier Priyankara Fernando. You have made all Sri Lankans proud by your intelligent & courageous gesture, which is a statement of truth. An officer should be commended & not reprimanded for such action. 

Shame on our foreign service with a third world, third class mentality.

comments.comment: Hodai janadipathi thuwa konda kilin thiyan thiranaya Aran thiyanawa godak santhosai ranaviruwawa beraganne
comments.author: Gihan delruksha sooriya

comments.comment: Dan tikak husama podak ganna puluwan..ow janadi pati tuma kala kriyawata api lak hatiyata wasiyan parassa karnemu..ona ohoma karanna kelin wada..janatawage hadawatata awakama kttu wenna..ape me abeeta weeraodayata sadanayak una.....ape kama api niraturuwama raka gata utui..ewagema me weerodayage araksawat ape janadi pati salaikili mat viya utui...mohu gana damila tarassain enne wairryen .mun samaga eropa ratawal harima sameepai...mohuge jeevitayata anaturak karanna puluwan....kese wetat mohuta dalada samiduge pihita araksawa labewa nira turuwama.. ohuwa arakssa karatwa laka wasi apage asirwadayai..budu sarani.
comments.author: Udhudh Champa

replies.replyComment: Aiyo... me moda minussu thamath Mahinda pitipasse yanawa. Eya karal thiyana dusana saha horakam penne natthe eya kerehi thiyan anda bhakthiya nisane. Me aya jaathiwadayen anda wela. Mahindatai Raniltai kade yana aya deshapremiyo wenna kohethma beha. Mokada dannawada? Desha premiyo dushanayata wanchawata kemathi neha. Maithree janadipathi rata clean karala ganna hadanakota api sahayogaya diya yuthui.
Obe ammata hikuwanam hoda nadda maytree

comments.comment: janadipathi thumanai oba kala me kriywa gananam godak sathutui
comments.author: I Am New
